features.featureTitle:
In LandingPage.tsx, find the paragraph element located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[3]/div[1]/p[1] (the first

inside the third div of the ICP teaser section) and apply a darker text color so it meets sufficient contrast against its background. Use a dark, high-contrast color class (e.g., text-gray-900 in light mode, or an equivalent dark foreground token) to ensure legibility.
